Grammar:   Map 5.0
Namespace: shr.fhir
Target:    FHIR_STU_3

PatientConstraintsEntry maps to Patient:
	Value maps to birthDate
	ActiveFlag maps to active
	Name maps to name.text


PatientDirectMapEntry maps to Patient:
	ActiveFlag maps to active

PractitionerEntry maps to Practitioner:
    IndirectActiveFlag.ActiveFlag maps to active
